content: notes this pattern is worked in continuous rounds so do not chain one at the beginning of each round i offer it as a free pattern because it is not very detailed and will not include pictures for this pattern you ll need to know how to single_crochet increase and work in the back loop only as well as front loop only i d love to see your finished espresso buddy please tag me on instagram @mindymadeit so i can see and share please don t copy or reproduce my pattern you re welcome to sell finished espressos but please credit me as the designer if you do =
